author: n3tsurge
description: This capability outlines the process of unblocking a URL that has been previously blocked due to security concerns. It includes steps for verifying the legitimacy of the unblock request, ensuring that the URL is no longer a threat, and updating web filtering or security rules accordingly.

requirements.description: Verified clean state of systems and data before restoration.
Recovery procedures and backup systems available for restoration.
Monitoring capabilities to detect any signs of threat persistence during recovery.
Network monitoring tools and access to network infrastructure for analysis and control.

title: Unblock Blocked URL

references.name: Network Security Controls and Traffic Filtering
NIST SP 800-41 Rev. 1: Guidelines for Firewall and Network Security
